author: forthommel
body:
This PR introduces the CTPPS pixel detector geometry description, along with several improvements in the overall CTPPS geometry definition code:
* the `TotemRPGeometry` object is now renamed `CTPPSGeometry` to fit the new naming of all objects used in RP info reconstruction
* a major cleanup of -now- outdated and unused geometry/alignment objects
* no differences expected in the standard processing outputs
* pixels geometry central in the foreseen reconstruction algorithms

`runTheMatrix -l limited` on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19922/commits/6222e5a14bd91209295608f7245c5a8617a810ee yielded:
`16 16 15 12 7 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` (`4.22` failed at `Step0` with the usual DAS error)
title: CTPPS: Pixel geometry
